author: Shawn L Roberts

review: This allows wireless streaming from a PC or iPad to a TV equipped with an HDMI input.  You must have a Wi-Fi network in your home.  Set-up was easy and fast, and Google is to be commended for that.  Sometimes getting these devices working properly is like pulling teeth.My only issue is that the device is limited to streaming of Google-approved commercial sources such as Hulu, Netflix, YouTube and HBO GO.  For example, you cannot stream home video from your computer or iPad to your TV using this device.  And you cannot stream a web page either.  Both of these uses are within the capability of the device but for some reason Google has limited its functionality.So I gave it three stars.  If through a firmware (or other) update they would enable the device to handle all of the functions of which its capable, then I'd be the first to give it a resounding five stars.  But not now.
